AnalysisType.description: List of Ontology for Biomedical Investigations (OBI) CV terms used to describe analytic methods that generate C2M2 files

description.description: A human-readable description of this OBI term

synonyms.description: A list of synonyms for this term as identified by the OBI metadata

AnalysisType.title: AnalysisType

Anatomy.description: List of Uber-anatomy ontology (UBERON) CV terms used to locate the origin of a C2M2 biosample within the physiology of its source or host organism

description.description: A human-readable description of this UBERON term

synonyms.description: A list of synonyms for this term as identified by the UBERON metadata

Anatomy.title: Anatomy

AssayType.description: List of Ontology for Biomedical Investigations (OBI) CV terms used to describe types of experiment that generate C2M2 biosamples or results stored in C2M2 files

description.description: A human-readable description of this OBI term

synonyms.description: A list of synonyms for this term as identified by the OBI metadata

AssayType.title: AssayType

Biosample.description: A tissue sample or other physical specimen

anatomy.description: An UBERON CV term ID used to locate the origin of this biosample within the physiology of its source or host organism

assay_type.description: An OBI CV term ID (from the 'planned process' branch of the vocabulary, excluding the 'assay' subtree) describing the preparation method that produced this biosample

creation_time.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this biosample's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

id_namespace.description: A CFDE-cleared identifier representing the top-level data space containing this biosample [part 1 of 2-component composite primary key]

local_id.description: An identifier representing this biosample, unique within this id_namespace [part 2 of 2-component composite primary key]

persistent_id.description: A persistent, resolvable (not necessarily retrievable) URI or compact ID permanently attached to this biosample

project_id_namespace.description: The id_namespace of the primary project within which this biosample was created [part 1 of 2-component composite foreign key]

project_local_id.description: The local_id of the primary project within which this biosample was created [part 2 of 2-component composite foreign key]

Biosample.title: Biosample

BiosampleDisease.description: Association between a C2M2 biosample and a disease positively (e.g. cancer tumor tissue sample) OR negatively (e.g. cancer-free tissue sample) identified for that biosample

association_type.description: The relationship between this biosample and this disease (e.g. 'observed' or '(tested for, but) not observed')

disease.description: A Disease Ontology CV term ID describing this disease

BiosampleDisease.title: BiosampleDisease

BiosampleFromSubject.description: Association between a biosample and its source subject

age_at_sampling.description: The age in years (with a fixed precision of two digits past the decimal point) of this subject when this biosample was taken

BiosampleFromSubject.title: BiosampleFromSubject

BiosampleGene.description: Association between a C2M2 biosample and an Ensembl gene especially relevant to it
BiosampleGene.title: BiosampleGene

BiosampleInCollection.description: Association between a biosample and a (containing) collection
BiosampleInCollection.title: BiosampleInCollection

BiosampleSubstance.description: Association between a C2M2 biosample and a PubChem substance experimentally associated with that biosample

substance.description: A PubChem substance ID (SID) describing this substance

BiosampleSubstance.title: BiosampleSubstance

Collection.description: A grouping of C2M2 files, biosamples and/or subjects

abbreviation.description: A very short display label for this collection

creation_time.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this collection's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

description.description: A human-readable description of this collection

has_time_series_data.description: Does this collection contain time-series data? (allowed values: [true|false|null] -- true == yes, contains time-series data; false == no, doesn't contain time-series data; null == no info provided)

id_namespace.description: A CFDE-cleared identifier representing the top-level data space containing this collection [part 1 of 2-component composite primary key]

local_id.description: An identifier representing this collection, unique within this id_namespace [part 2 of 2-component composite primary key]

persistent_id.description: A persistent, resolvable (not necessarily retrievable) URI or compact ID permanently attached to this collection

Collection.title: Collection

CollectionAnatomy.description: Association between an UBERON anatomical term and a C2M2 collection containing experimental resources directly related to the study of the anatomical concept described by that term
CollectionAnatomy.title: CollectionAnatomy

CollectionCompound.description: Association between a compound and a C2M2 collection containing experimental resources directly related to the study of that compound

compound.description: A PubChem or GlyTouCan term ID describing this compound

CollectionCompound.title: CollectionCompound

CollectionDefinedByProject.description: (Shallow) association between a collection and a project that defined it

collection_id_namespace.description: ID of the identifier namespace corresponding to the C2M2 submission containing this collection

project_id_namespace.description: ID of the identifier namespace corresponding to the C2M2 submission containing this project

CollectionDefinedByProject.title: CollectionDefinedByProject

CollectionDisease.description: Association between a disease and a C2M2 collection containing experimental resources directly related to the study of that disease

disease.description: A Disease Ontology CV term ID describing this disease

CollectionDisease.title: CollectionDisease

CollectionGene.description: Association between a gene and a C2M2 collection containing experimental resources directly related to the study of that gene

gene.description: An Ensembl term ID describing this gene

CollectionGene.title: CollectionGene

CollectionInCollection.description: Association between a containing collection (superset) and a contained collection (subset)

subset_collection_id_namespace.description: ID of the identifier namespace corresponding to the C2M2 submission containing the subset collection

subset_collection_local_id.description: The ID of the subset collection

superset_collection_id_namespace.description: ID of the identifier namespace corresponding to the C2M2 submission containing the superset collection

superset_collection_local_id.description: The ID of the superset collection

CollectionInCollection.title: CollectionInCollection

CollectionPhenotype.description: Association between a phenotype and a C2M2 collection containing experimental resources directly related to the study of that phenotype

phenotype.description: A Human Phenotype Ontology CV term ID describing this phenotype

CollectionPhenotype.title: CollectionPhenotype

CollectionProtein.description: Association between a protein and a C2M2 collection containing experimental resources directly related to the study of that protein

protein.description: A UniProtKB term ID describing this protein

CollectionProtein.title: CollectionProtein

CollectionSubstance.description: Association between a substance and a C2M2 collection containing experimental resources directly related to the study of that substance

substance.description: A PubChem term ID describing this substance

CollectionSubstance.title: CollectionSubstance

CollectionTaxonomy.description: Association between a taxon and a C2M2 collection containing experimental resources directly related to the study of that taxon

taxon.description: An NCBI Taxonomy Database ID identifying this taxon

CollectionTaxonomy.title: CollectionTaxonomy

Compound.description: List of (i) GlyTouCan terms or (ii) PubChem 'compound' terms (normalized chemical structures) referenced in this submission; (ii) will include all PubChem 'compound' terms associated with any PubChem 'substance' terms (specific formulations of chemical materials) directly referenced in this submission, in addition to any 'compound' terms directly referenced

description.description: A human-readable description of this compound

id.description: A GlyTouCan ID or a PubChem compound ID (CID)

synonyms.description: A list of synonyms for this compound

Compound.title: Compound

DataType.description: List of EDAM CV 'data:' terms used to describe data in C2M2 files

description.description: A human-readable description of this EDAM data term

synonyms.description: A list of synonyms for this term as identified by the EDAM metadata

DataType.title: DataType

Dcc.description: The Common Fund program or data coordinating center (DCC, identified by the given project foreign key) that produced this C2M2 instance

contact_email.description: Email address of this DCC's primary technical contact

contact_name.description: Name of this DCC's primary technical contact

dcc_abbreviation.description: A very short display label for this contact's DCC

dcc_description.description: A human-readable description of this DCC

dcc_name.description: A short, human-readable, machine-read-friendly label for this DCC

dcc_url.description: URL of the front page of the website for this DCC

id.description: The identifier for this DCC, issued by the CFDE-CC

project_id_namespace.description: ID of the identifier namespace for the project record representing the C2M2 submission produced by this DCC

project_local_id.description: Foreign key identifying the project record representing the C2M2 submission produced by this DCC

Dcc.title: Dcc

Disease.description: List of Disease Ontology terms used to describe diseases recorded in association with C2M2 subjects or biosamples

description.description: A human-readable description of this Disease Ontology term

synonyms.description: A list of synonyms for this term as identified by the Disease Ontology metadata

Disease.title: Disease

analysis_type.description: An OBI CV term ID describing the type of analytic operation that generated this file

assay_type.description: An OBI CV term ID describing the type of experiment that generated the results summarized by this file

bundle_collection_id_namespace.description: If this file is a bundle encoding more than one sub-file, this field gives the id_namespace of a collection listing the bundle's sub-file contents; null otherwise

bundle_collection_local_id.description: If this file is a bundle encoding more than one sub-file, this field gives the local_id of a collection listing the bundle's sub-file contents; null otherwise

compression_format.description: An EDAM CV term ID identifying the compression format of this file (e.g. gzip or bzip2): null if this file is not compressed

creation_time.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this file's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

data_type.description: An EDAM CV term ID identifying the type of information stored in this file (e.g. RNA sequence reads): null if is_bundle is set to true

dbgap_study_id.description: The name of a dbGaP study ID governing access control for this file, compatible for comparison to RAS user-level access control metadata

file_format.description: An EDAM CV term ID identifying the digital format of this file (e.g. TSV or FASTQ): if this file is compressed, this should be its _uncompressed_ format

filename.description: A filename with no prepended PATH information

id_namespace.description: A CFDE-cleared identifier representing the top-level data space containing this file [part 1 of 2-component composite primary key]

local_id.description: An identifier representing this file, unique within this id_namespace [part 2 of 2-component composite primary key]

md5.description: (allowed) MD5 checksum for this file [sha256, md5 cannot both be null]

mime_type.description: A MIME type describing this file

persistent_id.description: A persistent, resolvable (not necessarily retrievable) URI or compact ID permanently attached to this file

project_id_namespace.description: The id_namespace of the primary project within which this file was created [part 1 of 2-component composite foreign key]

project_local_id.description: The local_id of the primary project within which this file was created [part 2 of 2-component composite foreign key]

sha256.description: (preferred) SHA-256 checksum for this file [sha256, md5 cannot both be null]

size_in_bytes.description: The size of this file in bytes

uncompressed_size_in_bytes.description: The total decompressed size in bytes of the contents of this file: null if this file is not compressed

FileDescribesBiosample.description: Association between a biosample and a file containing information about that biosample
FileDescribesBiosample.title: FileDescribesBiosample

FileDescribesCollection.description: Association between a summary file and an entire collection described by that file
FileDescribesCollection.title: FileDescribesCollection

FileDescribesSubject.description: Association between a subject and a file containing information about that subject
FileDescribesSubject.title: FileDescribesSubject

FileFormat.description: List of EDAM CV 'format:' terms used to describe formats of C2M2 files

description.description: A human-readable description of this EDAM format term

synonyms.description: A list of synonyms for this term as identified by the EDAM metadata

FileFormat.title: FileFormat

FileInCollection.description: Association between a file and a (containing) collection
FileInCollection.title: FileInCollection

Gene.description: List of Ensembl genes directly referenced in this C2M2 submission

description.description: The Ensembl 'Description' of this gene (e.g. 'BRCA1 DNA repair associated')

organism.description: An NCBI Taxonomy Database ID identifying this gene's source organism (e.g. 'NCBI:txid9606')

synonyms.description: A list of Ensembl 'Gene synonyms' for this gene (e.g. ['BRCC1', 'FANCS', 'PPP1R53', 'RNF53'])

Gene.title: Gene

IdNamespace.description: A table listing identifier namespaces registered by the DCC submitting this C2M2 instance

abbreviation.description: A very short display label for this identifier namespace

description.description: A human-readable description of this identifier namespace

IdNamespace.title: IdNamespace

NcbiTaxonomy.description: List of NCBI Taxonomy Database IDs identifying taxa used to describe C2M2 subjects

clade.description: The phylogenetic level (e.g. species, genus) assigned to this taxon

description.description: A human-readable description of this taxon

id.description: An NCBI Taxonomy Database ID identifying a particular taxon

synonyms.description: A list of synonyms for this taxon as identified by the NCBI Taxonomy DB

NcbiTaxonomy.title: NcbiTaxonomy

Phenotype.description: List of Human Phenotype Ontology terms used to describe phenotypes recorded in association with C2M2 subjects

description.description: A human-readable description of this Human Phenotype Ontology term

synonyms.description: A list of synonyms for this term as identified by the Human Phenotype Ontology metadata

Phenotype.title: Phenotype

PhenotypeDisease.description: Association between a Human Phenotype Ontology term and a Disease Ontology term identifying a disease especially relevant to it

disease.description: A Disease Ontology CV term ID

phenotype.description: A Human Phenotype Ontology CV term ID

PhenotypeDisease.title: PhenotypeDisease

PhenotypeGene.description: Association between a Human Phenotype Ontology term and an Ensembl gene especially relevant to it

phenotype.description: A Human Phenotype Ontology CV term ID

PhenotypeGene.title: PhenotypeGene

Project.description: A node in the C2M2 project hierarchy subdividing all resources described by this DCC's C2M2 metadata

abbreviation.description: A very short display label for this project

creation_time.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this project's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

description.description: A human-readable description of this project

id_namespace.description: A CFDE-cleared identifier representing the top-level data space containing this project [part 1 of 2-component composite primary key]

local_id.description: An identifier representing this project, unique within this id_namespace [part 2 of 2-component composite primary key]

persistent_id.description: A persistent, resolvable (not necessarily retrievable) URI or compact ID permanently attached to this project

Project.title: Project

ProjectInProject.description: Association between a child project and its parent

child_project_id_namespace.description: ID of the identifier namespace for the child in this parent-child project pair

child_project_local_id.description: The ID of the contained (child) project

parent_project_id_namespace.description: ID of the identifier namespace for the parent in this parent-child project pair

parent_project_local_id.description: The ID of the containing (parent) project

ProjectInProject.title: ProjectInProject

Protein.description: List of UniProtKB proteins directly referenced in this C2M2 submission

organism.description: OPTIONAL: An NCBI Taxonomy Database ID identifying this protein's source organism (e.g. 'NCBI:txid9606')

synonyms.description: A list of alternate names for this protein

Protein.title: Protein

ProteinGene.description: Association between a UniProtKB protein term and an Ensembl term identifying a gene encoding that protein
ProteinGene.title: ProteinGene

Subject.description: A biological entity from which a C2M2 biosample can in principle be generated

age_at_enrollment.description: The age in years (with a fixed precision of two digits past the decimal point) of this subject when they were first enrolled in the primary project within which they were studied

creation_time.description: An ISO 8601 -- RFC 3339 (subset)-compliant timestamp documenting this subject record's creation time: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS±NN:NN

ethnicity.description: A CFDE CV category characterizing the self-reported ethnicity of this subject

granularity.description: A CFDE CV category characterizing this subject by multiplicity

id_namespace.description: A CFDE-cleared identifier representing the top-level data space containing this subject [part 1 of 2-component composite primary key]

local_id.description: An identifier representing this subject, unique within this id_namespace [part 2 of 2-component composite primary key]

persistent_id.description: A persistent, resolvable (not necessarily retrievable) URI or compact ID permanently attached to this subject

project_id_namespace.description: The id_namespace of the primary project within which this subject was studied [part 1 of 2-component composite foreign key]

project_local_id.description: The local_id of the primary project within which this subject was studied [part 2 of 2-component composite foreign key]

sex.description: A CFDE CV category characterizing the physiological sex of this subject

Subject.title: Subject

SubjectDisease.description: Association between a C2M2 subject and a disease positively OR negatively clinically identified in that subject

association_type.description: The relationship between this subject and this disease (e.g. 'observed' or '(tested for, but) not observed')

disease.description: A Disease Ontology CV term ID describing this disease

SubjectDisease.title: SubjectDisease

SubjectInCollection.description: Association between a subject and a (containing) collection
SubjectInCollection.title: SubjectInCollection

SubjectPhenotype.description: Association between a C2M2 subject and a phenotype positively OR negatively clinically identified for that subject

association_type.description: The relationship between this subject and this phenotype (e.g. 'observed' or '(tested for, but) not observed')

phenotype.description: A Human Phenotype Ontology CV term ID describing this phenotype

SubjectPhenotype.title: SubjectPhenotype

SubjectRace.description: Identification of a C2M2 subject with one or more self-selected races

race.description: A race self-identified by this subject

SubjectRace.title: SubjectRace

SubjectRoleTaxonomy.description: Trinary association linking IDs representing (1) a subject, (2) a subject_role (a named organism-level constituent component of a subject, like 'host', 'pathogen', 'endosymbiont', 'taxon detected inside a microbiome subject', etc.) and (3) a taxonomic label (which is hereby assigned to this particular subject_role within this particular subject)

role_id.description: The ID of the role assigned to this organism-level constituent component of this subject

taxonomy_id.description: An NCBI Taxonomy Database ID identifying this taxon

SubjectRoleTaxonomy.title: SubjectRoleTaxonomy

SubjectSubstance.description: Association between a C2M2 subject and a PubChem substance experimentally associated with that subject

substance.description: A PubChem substance ID (SID) describing this substance

SubjectSubstance.title: SubjectSubstance

Substance.description: List of PubChem 'substance' terms (specific formulations of chemical materials) directly referenced in this C2M2 submission

compound.description: The (unique) PubChem compound ID (CID) associated with this PubChem SID

description.description: A human-readable description of this PubChem SID

synonyms.description: A list of synonyms for this PubChem SID

Substance.title: Substance
